header: 3CORRECT: Condensed Error Recognition via Knowledge Transfer

images.caption: Figure 4:Example of an error schema generated on theWho&Whendataset.
Figure 5:CORRECT-Error includes diverse tasks. The synthesized data preserves high realism, where human labelers frequently misclassified synthetic errors as genuine ones.
Figure 6:CORRECTdelivers consistent improvements on Algorithm-Generated, with schemata generated and transferred on Hand-Crafted dataset.
Figure 6:CORRECTdelivers consistent improvements on Algorithm-Generated, with schemata generated and transferred on Hand-Crafted dataset.
